data.title: Up and Down
data.statement:
You programmed a robot to move on your command. But, you don't know where it will stop :( 
Your task is to find where the robot would end up, so that you know where it will be :)

<<Instructions:>>
The robot starts at position 0.
These are the commands and their effects:

<<Rise>> - Position increments by 2
<<Leap>> - Position increments by 1
<<Sink>> - Position decrements by 1
<<Fall>> - Position decrements by 2
<<Reset>> - Position resets to 0

Good Luck!

testCases.title: On The Shore
testCases.testIn: Fall Fall Fall Rise Rise Rise Leap

testCases.title: To the surface!
testCases.testIn: Fall Fall Leap Fall Rise Rise Leap

testCases.title: Hardwork to Easywork
testCases.testIn: Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Reset Rise

testCases.title: Nothing to Everything
testCases.testIn: Fall Fall Fall Fall Reset Rise

testCases.title: This will take a while
testCases.testIn: Rise Leap Leap Rise Fall Leap Rise Rise Reset Leap Fall Rise Leap Rise Fall Sink Sink Leap Sink Leap Reset Fall Leap Sink Rise

testCases.title: Nothing Happened
testCases.testIn: Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Rise Reset Fall Rise Fall Rise Fall Rise Fall Rise Fall Rise Fall Rise Fall Rise Fall Rise Fall Rise Fall Rise Fall Rise Fall Rise

testCases.title: Under the sea!
testCases.testIn: Sink Fall Sink Fall Reset Sink

data.constraints: There won't be any invalid commands
data.stubGenerator:
read C:string(500)
write Result

STATEMENT
Lets find where the robot lands!

INPUT
C:The sentence containing all the commands

OUTPUT
The position of the robot
data.inputDescription: <<Line 1:>> A sentence [[C]] containing all commands separated by spaces

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You programmed a robot to move on your command. But, you don't know where it will stop :(
Your task is to find where the robot would end up, so that you know where it will be :)

Instructions:
The robot starts at position 0.
These are the commands and their effects:

Rise - Position increments by 2
Leap - Position increments by 1
Sink - Position decrements by 1
Fall - Position decrements by 2
Reset - Position resets to 0

Good Luck!
Input
Line 1: A sentence C containing all commands separated by spaces
Output
Line 1: The ending position
Constraints
There won't be any invalid commands
Example
Input
Rise Rise
Output
4
